title: IT Engineer

description:
- Plan, implement, and maintain the software development infrastructure
- Introduce and oversee software development automation across cloud provider like AWS
- Help develop, manage, and monitor continuous integration and delivery systems.
- Collaborate with software developers, QA and other team members to ensure timely and successful delivery of new software releases
- Assist with troubleshooting and problem-solving when issues arise
- keep up date with the latest industry trends and best practice while ensuring the company meets configuration requirements
- Participate in team improvement initiatives
- Help create and maintain internal documentation using Git or other similar applications
- Provide on-call support as needed.
requirement:
- Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field
- 4 years experiences
- Ability to code and script in multiple languages and automation framework line Ruby and Javascript
- Understanding the best security practices and automating security testing ad update in the CI/CD pipelines
- Ability to conveniently deploy monitoring and logging infrastructure using tools like Prometheus, Nagios.
- Proficiency in container frameworks like Docker and Kubernetes
- Mastering in the use of infrastructure automation toolsets Amazon AWS , and other cloud platforms
- Understanding of various operating systems, especially, Linux as most public cloud operate on Linux or Unix systems.

title: Business Administration (IT) $400-$450

description:
JOB PURPOSE: 
The IT system engineer is responsible for the design, implementation, and maintenance of the company's IT infrastructure. This includes servers, system software, virtualization, backups, monitoring, and ensuring uptime. The IT system engineer will work with a team of IT professionals to ensure that the company's IT infrastructure is reliable, secure, and cost-effective.

JOB SCOPE:
IT system engineer is managing and monitoring all installed systems and infrastructure. He installs, configure, test, and maintain operating systems, application software and system management tools. He is responsible for ensuring that the servers are running smoothly, and that the system software is up to date. System Engineer also manage virtualization, backups, monitoring and ensuring uptime.
Support and troubleshoot problems.
Ensure uninterrupted operation of servers and system software

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES 
‚Ä¢	Design, implement, and maintain the company's IT infrastructure.
‚Ä¢	Work with a team of IT professionals to ensure that the company's IT infrastructure is reliable, secure, and cost-effective.
‚Ä¢	Monitor the company's IT infrastructure for performance and security issues.
‚Ä¢	Troubleshoot and resolve IT issues.
‚Ä¢	Provide technical support to users.
‚Ä¢	Stay up to date on the latest IT technologies.
requirement:
REQUIREMENT 
‚Ä¢	Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field.
‚Ä¢	3+ years of experience in IT systems engineering.
‚Ä¢	Strong knowledge of servers, system software, virtualization (VM Ware or others), backups, and monitoring.
‚Ä¢	Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
‚Ä¢	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
‚Ä¢	A qualified systems engineer will have a background in IT, computer systems engineering, and analysis.

JOIN WITH US:
1- Public holiday follows to labor law.                         4- On job training will be provided 
2- Challenge salary and benefit                                     5- Difference work experience and equal applicant opportunity 
3- Cooperative teamwork                                              6- Motivative and professional challenge.

HOW TO APPLY:
1.	Interest candidates shall submit the cover letter and CV with relevant certificate document through to below address:
ÔÉò	Office building: No.#6, Street 392, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang I, Khan Boeung keng Kang, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
ÔÉò	Contact us: +855 23 216 222, Telegram 016 77 25 66
ÔÉò	E-mail: career@dpc-group.com, Website: www.dpc-group.com 
ÔÉò	Submitted document no later than Oct-11-2023 and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.

description:
1.Provide technical assistance and support to end-users, including troubleshooting hardware and software issues, resolving network connectivity problems and attending user inquiries.
2.Installing and configuring computer hardware, PC and server operating system and applications.
3.Maintain and create new user profile on Active directory domain and managing file server access rights.
4.Monitoring and maintaining organization‚Äôs computer network infrastructure, including but no limit to configuring, installing and managing network devices such as Switch, Router and etc.
5.Maintenance of printers, servers, network switches, routers, time attendance system and etc.
6.Security measures to protect the organization‚Äôs computer systems and data from unauthorized access, including managing antivirus software and windows security update.
7.Assist and involve with annual IT audits and provide recommendation hardware and or software application upgrade.
8.Involve with purchasing of IT equipment.
9.Perform schedule backup and forecast the storage size needed and number of backup-media for the organization.
10.Maintain and update fixed asset information for IT hardware and devices.
11.Performs other related duties as assigned.
requirement:
1.Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Information Technology or IT related field.
2.At least 3 years‚Äô experience in IT field.
3.Good in English for both writing and speaking as well as verbal communication.
4.Demonstrable knowledge of Security and firewall hardware.
5.Knowledge and experience of working secure corporate wireless networks.
6.Good knowledge in windows operating systems, such as windows clients, server and ability to troubleshoots and resolves from basic to advance IT issues.
7.Excellent problem-solving skills to diagnose and resolve technical issue efficiently and provide timely updates on the status of task assigned.
8.Able to work under pressure and deadline.
9.Be honest, trustworthy, respectful and customer service oriented.
10.Successful candidate will be undergo training at Kambol factory, thereafter stationed at Banla-Sa factory.
